Name: Sengoku hime 2 - Senran no Yo Gunyuu Arashi no Gotoku
Overview:
Sengoku Hime - Burning in a War World - #Summary and Sengoku Hime - Burning in a War World -#PS2 PSP ported version See. Only a few changes will be listed here.

The concepts of military commander skills and experience added in the previous consumer version (hereinafter referred to as the CS version) have been strengthened.
Of the CS version, PlayStation 2 Edition Date Masamune Scenario, PlayStation Portable In the version, the Michiyuki Tachibana scenario (belonging to the Otomo family) was added, but in this work you can play both scenarios. The main character's position is that in the Date family scenario, he is a former vassal of a powerful clan that was in conflict with the Date family, and in the Tachibana Doyuki scenario, he is a tactician Kakukuma Ishimune His position is as the successor of. Furthermore, in the Xbox version, a scenario by Naoshige Nabeshima (affiliated with the Ryuzoji family) will be added.
